entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 p.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
